item.title: CVE-2024-24803|2024-02-10T07:49:02.496Z -- WPoperation -- Ultra Companion – Companion plugin for WPoperation Themes
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPoperation Ultra Companion – Companion plugin for WPoperation Themes allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ultra Companion – Companion plugin for WPoperation Themes: from n/a through 1.1.9.
